Summary: Had white light towards to ground and had lots of beams like shooting.
divs: Sighting DetailsFirst I was in a car my husband was driving and I was passenger sheat. I found somthing orange, but that was too big as helicopter and it was different light color from airplane. then the light start having white light like stage light stright to graund, and then start shooting the beams to sky like military. it was alot. but not keep on shooting. it was like 8 or 10 red dots comming out from that thing and go farther then come out again. I told my husband but he said that he doesn't see the light. if it was rael airplain somebody could get hurt. that much beams came out. like 8 to 10 dots came out one time and totally 3 or 4 times. the that disapeared while I was watching. so can't be man made. I kept lookin at sky but couldn't find again. the white light was like exactly same kind in the movie like UFO sucking up the human.
